summary: Implements a Flax (JAX) version of the BigBird transformer specialized for token‑level classification, managing model initialization, weight loading, and forward computation to generate per‑token logits.
business_intent: Enables efficient, scalable sequence labeling (e.g., named‑entity recognition, POS tagging) on long texts by providing a ready‑to‑use token classification model based on BigBird’s sparse attention architecture.
